name: Red Planet Resort
description: Luxury accommodations on the Martian surface with breathtaking views.
detailedDescription: Experience the beauty of Mars from the comfort of the Red Planet Resort, featuring luxurious rooms with panoramic views of the Martian landscape.

name: Martian Meadows Inn
detailedDescription: Enjoy a relaxing stay at Martian Meadows Inn, where modern amenities meet the rugged beauty of Mars.

name: Celestial Suites
description: Elegant suites offering a serene environment.
detailedDescription: Celestial Suites provide a tranquil escape with elegant decor and stunning views of the Martian horizon.

name: Venusian Heights Hotel
description: Experience unparalleled luxury with breathtaking views and world-class amenities.
detailedDescription: Venusian Heights Hotel offers opulent accommodations with exquisite dining and breathtaking views of the clouds.

name: Cloud Nine Retreat
description: Enjoy comfortable accommodations with essential amenities in a peaceful setting.
detailedDescription: Cloud Nine Retreat provides a serene atmosphere with comfortable rooms and easy access to local attractions.

name: Ethereal Budget Inn
description: Affordable stays with basic facilities, perfect for budget-conscious travelers.
detailedDescription: Ethereal Budget Inn offers essential amenities at an affordable price, making it ideal for budget travelers.

name: Sunny Bunks
description: Shared cabins with bunk beds, perfect for budget travelers looking to meet new people.
detailedDescription: Sunny Bunks offers a hostel-like experience with shared accommodations featuring comfortable bunk beds, ideal for solo travelers or groups.

name: Helios Haven Private Cabin
description: A spacious private cabin featuring modern amenities and a cozy atmosphere.
detailedDescription: Helios Haven Private Cabin includes a queen-sized bed, a private bathroom, and stunning views of the solar system through large windows.

name: Supernova Superior Suite
description: An opulent luxury suite with premium furnishings, offering the ultimate experience for those looking to indulge during their journey.
detailedDescription: The Supernova Superior Suite features a king-sized bed, an en-suite bathroom with a soaking tub, and a private balcony with personalized service.
